name: Independent
description: Not affiliated with any major galactic organization

name: Rebel Alliance
description: Alliance to Restore the Republic, a resistance movement formed to oppose the Galactic Empire

name: Galactic Empire
description: Autocratic regime that replaced the Galactic Republic and ruled the galaxy

name: Jedi Order
description: Order of Force-sensitive guardians who served as peacekeepers in the Galactic Republic

name: Resistance
description: Military force founded by Leia Organa to counter the threat of the First Order

name: Sith Order
description: Ancient organization of Force-sensitive beings who used the dark side of the Force

name: First Order
description: Military junta inspired by the Galactic Empire that rose from its remnants

name: New Republic
description: Democratic government formed after the fall of the Galactic Empire

name: Galactic Republic
description: Democratic union that governed the galaxy before the rise of the Empire

name: Trade Federation
description: Vast commercial organization that controlled trade routes and possessed substantial military power

name: Bounty Hunters' Guild
description: Organization that regulated bounty hunting throughout the galaxy
